title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 603.3 - Statutory authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 603.3 - Statutory authority

State Regulations
(a) Section
13.09
of
the Mental Hygiene Law grants the commissioner the authority to adopt rules and
regulations necessary and proper to implement any matter under his or her
jurisdiction. (b) This Part is
subject to the provisions of article 6 of the Public Officers Law, known as the

Freedom of Information Law. (c) The
rules of the State Committee on Open Government, promulgated as 21 NYCRR Part
1401, require the commissioner to publish regulations governing the public's
access to OPWDD records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
603.3

Amended

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
